title: Error message from `containsSubsequence` should print offending token
body:
#### Summary
The error message from `containsSubsequence` should print the contents and index of the first token that was not contained in the actual value.
See the example below.
In this case, the offending token is the following line:

```
"@DaggerGenerated
@Generated(    value = "dagger.internal.codegen.ComponentProcessor",    comments = "https://github.com/jbock-java/dapper")
@SuppressWarnings({    "unchecked",    "rawtypes"})"
```

Eyeball search for the offending token is taking too long, if you have a lot of failing tests.

#### Example

```
java.lang.AssertionError: 
Expecting actual:
  ["package test;",
    "",
    "import dagger.Lazy;",
    "import dagger.internal.DaggerGenerated;",
    "import dagger.internal.DoubleCheck;",
    "import jakarta.inject.Provider;",
    "import javax.annotation.processing.Generated;",
    "",
    "@DaggerGenerated",
    "@Generated(",
    "    value = "dagger.internal.codegen.ComponentProcessor",",
    "    comments = "https://github.com/jbock-java/dapper"",
    ")",
    "@SuppressWarnings({",
    "    "unchecked",",
    "    "rawtypes"",
    "})",
    "final class DaggerSimpleComponent implements SimpleComponent {",
    "  private final DaggerSimpleComponent simpleComponent = this;",
    "",
    "  private Provider<SomeInjectableType> someInjectableTypeProvider;",
    "",
    "  private DaggerSimpleComponent() {",
    "",
    "    initialize();",
    "",
    "  }",
    "",
    "  public static Builder builder() {",
    "    return new Builder();",
    "  }",
    "",
    "  public static SimpleComponent create() {",
    "    return new Builder().build();",
    "  }",
    "",
    "  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")",
    "  private void initialize() {",
    "    this.someInjectableTypeProvider = DoubleCheck.provider(SomeInjectableType_Factory.create());",
    "  }",
    "",
    "  @Override",
    "  public SomeInjectableType someInjectableType() {",
    "    return someInjectableTypeProvider.get();",
    "  }",
    "",
    "  @Override",
    "  public Lazy<SomeInjectableType> lazySomeInjectableType() {",
    "    return DoubleCheck.lazy(someInjectableTypeProvider);",
    "  }",
    "",
    "  @Override",
    "  public Provider<SomeInjectableType> someInjectableTypeProvider() {",
    "    return someInjectableTypeProvider;",
    "  }",
    "",
    "  static final class Builder {",
    "    private Builder() {",
    "    }",
    "",
    "    public SimpleComponent build() {",
    "      return new DaggerSimpleComponent();",
    "    }",
    "  }",
    "}"]
to contain sequence:
  ["package test;",
    "",
    "@DaggerGenerated
@Generated(    value = "dagger.internal.codegen.ComponentProcessor",    comments = "https://github.com/jbock-java/dapper")
@SuppressWarnings({    "unchecked",    "rawtypes"})",
    "final class DaggerSimpleComponent implements SimpleComponent {",
    "  private final DaggerSimpleComponent simpleComponent = this;",
    "  private Provider<SomeInjectableType> someInjectableTypeProvider;",
    "",
    "  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")",
    "  private void initialize() {",
    "    this.someInjectableTypeProvider =",
    "        DoubleCheck.provider(SomeInjectableType_Factory.create());",
    "  }",
    "",
    "  @Override",
    "  public SomeInjectableType someInjectableType() {",
    "    return someInjectableTypeProvider.get();",
    "  }",
    "",
    "  @Override",
    "  public Lazy<SomeInjectableType> lazySomeInjectableType() {",
    "    return DoubleCheck.lazy(someInjectableTypeProvider);",
    "  }",
    "",
    "  @Override",
    "  public Provider<SomeInjectableType> someInjectableTypeProvider() {",
    "    return someInjectableTypeProvider;",
    "  }",
    "}"]

```
